alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:54AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BALDWIN COUNTY THROUGH 545 AM CDT... At 453 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stapleton, or 6 miles north of Loxley, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stapleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
